from math import factorial

for x in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    players = map(int, raw_input().split())
    k = int(raw_input())
    players = sorted(players, reverse = True)
    index = k
    if index == len(players):
        print 1
    else:
        index = index-1 if k > 1 else 0
        temp = index
        temp_player = players[index]
        count = 0
        while temp > -1 and players[temp] == temp_player:
            temp -= 1
            count += 1
        total = players.count(temp_player)
        print factorial(total)/(factorial(count)*factorial(total-count))
